extensionDescription.message: Always opens certain websites (configurable list of websites) in a private window. Needs the permission to run in private windows.

domainHint.message: (Enter domain without http://, https://, and without any slashes)
domainHint.description: Hint about domains when entered in the dialog

domainAndSubdomains.description: Rule is for domain and subdomains

somewhereInURL.description: Rule is for a match somewhere in the domain name

invertRules.message: Invert (open everything in private window that does not match the list):

warningNoPrivateWindowPermission.message: The extension is missing the permission to run in private windows. Therefore, it will not work properly. Please grant the private window permission under the Details tab.
warningNoPrivateWindowPermission.description: Add-on was not granted the permission to run in private windows.
